text: Israel State Archives is the national archive of Israel. The archive is located in Jerusalem. The archive houses about 400 million documents, maps, stamps, audio tapes, video clips, photographs and special publications.Israel State Archives Launches New Initiative to Acquaint the Public with its Treasures == References == == Other websites == * Israel State Archives website * The English-language blog of the Israel State Archives Category:National archives in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Government of Israel Category:1955 establishments in Asia Category:1950s establishments in Israel
title: Israel State Archives
